data.text:
Luxury Vinyl Floors in Yorkton, SK

Luxury vinyl flooring is a great choice when traditional options like tile or hardwood flooring simply aren’t the best fit for you and your home. With its affordable price, durability, and easy keeping, luxury vinyl flooring brings you the best of both worlds.

At Carpet One Floor & Home in Yorkton, Saskatchewan, we know that whether you’re building or renovating your home, it’s important to find the right flooring for your lifestyle and budget. Whether you are just starting the process or ready to buy, our luxury vinyl flooring guide has got you covered on everything you should know before you buy.

What is Luxury Vinyl Flooring?

Luxury vinyl flooring is a newer flooring option that uses new manufacturing techniques and materials that feature the look and feel of all your favourite looks.

Through high-definition images of real wood and tile, luxury vinyl flooring offers realistic replications of popular flooring styles like hardwood, stone, and tile. Luxury vinyl flooring provides a versatile, durable flooring option that is water-resistant and easy to maintain compared to its traditional counterparts.

Luxury Vinyl Tile (LVT) and Luxury Vinyl Plank (LVP) are two types of luxury vinyl floors mainly differentiated by their shape and size. The beauty of luxury vinyl flooring is that it can be replaced individually if they become damaged. That means you won’t have to rip up your entire floor if only one tile or plank is damaged.

What is Luxury Vinyl Tile (LVT)?

Authentic tile appearance and feel

Same style, colours, patterns, and textures as traditional tile

Warmer and softer to the touch

More cushioned underfoot

Crack resistant

Individual pieces that can be installed separately

Can be grouted for an authentic looks

What is Luxury Vinyl Plank (LVP)?

Authentic hardwood appearance and feel

Wear-resistant

Moisture resistant

Require less maintenance

Do not need to be refinished

Can install in bathrooms, kitchens, basements, and more

Is Luxury Vinyl Flooring Waterproof?

While all luxury vinyl offers some level of moisture protection, luxury vinyl flooring also comes in fully 100% waterproof options, so you can rest assured humidity and spills won’t ruin your floors.

Moisture-resistant floors can eventually sustain damage from too much water and humidity exposure. However, waterproof luxury vinyl flooring has a rigid core structure that prevents the planks from shrinking and expanding. Watertight seams and a spill-repellent surface further prevent leaks from moving below the floor.

Meanwhile, a durable wear layer prevents stains and blemishes and makes your vinyl easy to clean. These beautiful floors can even be installed in basements and bathrooms where moisture can be a problem.

How Is Luxury Vinyl Flooring Installed?

When it comes to installation, luxury vinyl tile and plank usually require less installation time and can often be installed as a floating floor.

Floating floors are not permanently attached to the subfloor. Instead, they are placed together like a puzzle over the subfloor. This method isn’t recommended when installing luxury vinyl flooring under cabinetry since it can make it difficult to remove broken or damaged tiles or planks.

Depending on your current flooring and the condition of your subfloor, your sales professional will make a recommendation on how to install your new vinyl flooring. Our in-house team of installers will help make this entire process seamless and help work around your schedule.

Where Else Can I Install Vinyl Floors?

Luxury vinyl is an ideal flooring choice if you’re working on a new kitchen orbathroom design and want something affordable, easy to care for, and durable. You can also use luxury vinyl flooring throughout your home, and it’s popular in basements, mudrooms, and commercial settings.

Shop Luxury Vinyl Floors Near You in Yorkton, SK

Today’s vinyl flooring features some of the industry’s most advanced performance and design technologies available. Offering rich visuals and lasting value, luxury vinyl floors have become one of the most popular choices among today’s customers.

Here at Carpet One Floor & Home, we boast a great selection of luxury vinyl flooring from our topluxury vinyl brands and all the latest trends in luxury vinyl tile, plank, and sheet vinyl styles. As members of the world’s leading independent flooring cooperative, our locally owned flooring store offers the best variety, value, and services.
